detail_desc: Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a small embroidered detail at the top.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a small embroidered detail at the top.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with a decorative bow at the sides.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with a decorative bow at the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button, and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and welt back pockets. Elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt at the front, belt loops with a decorative button, and straight, gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button, and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and welt back pockets. Elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt at the front, belt loops with a decorative button, and straight, gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Knee-length dress in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Boat neck, low dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
V-neck dress in soft, ribbed jersey with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides.
V-neck dress in soft, ribbed jersey with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides.
Waist belt with decorative metal buckles at the front and elastication with a metal fastener. at the back.
Waist belt with decorative metal buckles at the front and elastication with a metal fastener. at the back.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in patterned jersey made from a soft viscose blend. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Pull-on jeans in washed, superstretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.
Pull-on jeans in washed, superstretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.
Metal hoop earrings in two parts with sparkly stones. Size approx. 3.5 cm.

Dress in a crisp, patterned cotton weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, elasticated puff sleeves and a gathered seam at the top for added width. Unlined.

Set with a top in cotton jersey and trousers in woven fabric. Long-sleeved top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif on the front. Trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Set with a top in cotton jersey and trousers in woven fabric. Long-sleeved top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif on the front. Trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pull-on trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a soft jersey lining. Wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, fake, diagonal front pockets and ribbed hems.
Joggers in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a soft finish. Regular drawstring waist with covered elastication, side pockets and tapered legs.
Joggers in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a soft finish. Regular drawstring waist with covered elastication, side pockets and tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a braided cotton weave with covered elastication at the back.
Lined bikini top with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, scalloped edges at the top and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
Lined bikini top with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, scalloped edges at the top and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with wide shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and decorative gathers at the sides.
Fully lined swimsuit with wide shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and decorative gathers at the sides.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Cable-knit front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Cable-knit front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey. Panel with a text print along the shoulders and sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey. Panel with a text print along the shoulders and sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey. Panel with a text print along the shoulders and sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey. Panel with a text print along the shoulders and sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Pyjamas with an oversized T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and slits in the sides. Shorts with an elasticated waist and all-over print.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Straight-cut top with short sleeves. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and gently tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Flared skirt in several layers of tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Unlined.
Flared skirt in several layers of tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Unlined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Relaxed fit with a seam at the waist, detachable tie belt, patch front pockets and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Patterned pencil case in glittery imitation leather with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x6x20 cm.
Jewellery set with an adjustable metal ring and necklace. Necklace with a chain and pendant. Adjustable length of necklace 39-47 cm.
Jewellery set with an adjustable metal ring and necklace. Necklace with a chain and pendant. Adjustable length of necklace 39-47 cm.
Metal rings in various designs. Size adjustable.
Bracelet in glittery imitation leather decorated with a silicone unicorn. Size 2.5x21 cm.
Push-up bras in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication with a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Playsuit in an airy viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, covered elastication around the top and a flounced trim at the front. Elasticated seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist, and side pockets.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.

Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and a yoke at the back. Buttons down the front, an open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Unlined. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in sturdy, glossy jersey with a square neckline that has a V-shaped incision at the front with support panels to help retain its shape. Cut-out section at the back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and flared legs. Lined at the top.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric. Detachable hood with covered elastication, a zip and button band with press-studs down the front and raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric. Detachable hood with covered elastication, a zip and button band with press-studs down the front and raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in corduroy made from a cotton and modal blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Trousers in corduroy made from a cotton and modal blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Metal hair grips decorated with plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length from 5.5 cm to 7 cm.
Sleeveless top in sturdy satin with a sheen. V-neck and a seam at the waist with a flared peplum and pleats for added width. Lined at the top.

Short dress in sturdy, heavyweight satin with a square neckline and narrow shoulder straps. Shaping darts at the top and a concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, concealed side pockets and a bell-shaped skirt with box pleats for added width. Lined bodice.

Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Legs with text-print side panels and decorative seams.

Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Legs with text-print side panels and decorative seams.

Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Legs with text-print side panels and decorative seams.

Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Legs with text-print side panels and decorative seams.
Short dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves with flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.

Thin jacket in soft cotton twill with a detachable hood and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening, yoke with a pleat at the back and patch pockets with appliqués and a glittery print. Elasticated cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lined.

Thin jacket in soft cotton twill with a detachable hood and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening, yoke with a pleat at the back and patch pockets with appliqués and a glittery print. Elasticated cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
